feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.8.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add license feature for PDF and update UI to account for it by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15865
  • Fix popover root selector by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15881

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.8.3...3.8.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.8.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove mysterious curly brace by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15882
  • /api/global/configs/public performance improvements by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15869
  • Automations External Data Connector picker by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15888

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.8.4...3.8.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.8.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update LLM license-based auth. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15885
  • Some typings created during the oauth2 work by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15812
  • Fix update queries against Google Sheets datasources. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15883
  • PWA Support by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15759
  • Make Proxy Timeouts Configurable via PROXY_TIMEOUT_SECONDS by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15908
  • Update pro reference by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15910
  • updates column name in import modal by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15905
  • Add license to the context. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15912
  • Add CSP whitelist feature to custom app scripts by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15898
  • Ensure that creators only include users with the creator role by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15919

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.8.5...3.8.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Provide user with context if license key has already been activated by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15927
  • Add accordion component by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15779
  • Rating Field Component by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15906
  • CSP whitelist validation by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15930
  • Pull in latest pro changes. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15928
  • Add tests for budibase AI self host quota. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15934

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.8.6...3.9.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.9.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Posthog ts conversion by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15941
  • Replaces MagicWand icon with Shapes autocolumns by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15938
  • Track Budibase AI quota locally as well as in cloud. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15949
  • Upgrade to dd-trace 5.47.0 by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15951
  • Expose LLM provider config via /api/global/self. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15953
  • Updated UI for generating JS from a prompt by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15942

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.9.0...3.9.1
